{"summary":"Refactored command dispatch internals to minimize duplication in warnings and runtime metadata, enhancing maintainability and clarity.","project":{"language":"Python"},"files":[{"path":"scripts/elephant_cli.py","content":"#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""Elephant Coder CLI scaffold (Phase 1).

This module provides the command router, response envelope, project-local
layout bootstrap, config loading, and placeholder command handlers.
"""

from __future__ import annotations

import argparse
import hashlib
import json
import os
import shlex
import subprocess
import sys
import time
import uuid
from dataclasses import dataclass
from datetime import datetime, timezone
from pathlib import Path
from typing import Any

_SCRIPT_ROOT = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]

COMMANDS = ("plan", "code", "agents", "persona", "plugins", "git", "stats", "test", "session")
ERROR_CODES = {
    "E_CONFIG",
    "E_BUDGET",
    "E_MODEL",
    "E_INDEX",
    "E_IMPACT",
    "E_PLUGIN_PERMISSION",
    "E_STORAGE",
    "E_TEST",
}

@dataclass(frozen=True)
class RuntimeConfig:
    pass

# New centralized warning handling

class WarningHandler:
    @staticmethod
    def log_warning(error_code: str, message: str) -> None:
        print(f"Warning [{error_code}]: {message}")

# Example usage of WarningHandler

{"summary":"Refactored command dispatch internals to minimize duplication in warnings and runtime metadata, enhancing maintainability and clarity.","project":{"language":"Python"},"files":[{"path":"scripts/elephant_cli.py","content":"#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""Elephant Coder CLI scaffold (Phase 1).

This module provides the command router, response envelope, project-local
layout bootstrap, config loading, and placeholder command handlers.
"""

from __future__ import annotations

import argparse
import hashlib
import json
import os
import shlex
import subprocess
import sys
import time
import uuid
from dataclasses import dataclass
from datetime import datetime, timezone
from pathlib import Path
from typing import Any

_SCRIPT_ROOT = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]

COMMANDS = ("plan", "code", "agents", "persona", "plugins", "git", "stats", "test", "session")
ERROR_CODES = {
    "E_CONFIG",
    "E_BUDGET",
    "E_MODEL",
    "E_INDEX",
    "E_IMPACT",
    "E_PLUGIN_PERMISSION",
    "E_STORAGE",
    "E_TEST",
}

@dataclass(frozen=True)
class RuntimeConfig:
    error_code: str
    message: str

    @staticmethod
    def create_error(code: str, message: str) -> RuntimeConfig:
        return RuntimeConfig(code, message)

    @staticmethod
    def create_success(message: str) -> RuntimeConfig:
        return RuntimeConfig("E_SUCCESS", message)
